    Frederik Vanhoutte, W:Blut

    • Method Detail

      • saveToOBJ

        public static void saveToOBJ(HE_Mesh mesh,
             HET_OBJWriter obj)
        Saves the mesh as OBJ format by appending it to the given mesh.
        Parameters:
        mesh - the mesh
        obj - the obj HET_OBJWriter instance. Karsten Schmidt, 2011

      • saveToOBJ

        public static void saveToOBJ(HE_Mesh mesh,
             java.io.OutputStream stream)
        Saves the mesh as OBJ format to the given OutputStream. Currently no texture coordinates are supported or written. Karsten Schmidt, 2011
        Parameters:
        mesh - the mesh
        stream - the stream

      • saveToOBJ

        public static void saveToOBJ(HE_Mesh mesh,
             java.lang.String path)
        Saves the mesh as OBJ format to the given file path. Existing files will be overwritten. Karsten Schmidt, 2011
        Parameters:
        mesh - the mesh
        path - the path

      • saveToSTL

        public static void saveToSTL(HE_Mesh mesh,
             java.lang.String path,
             double scale)
        Export mesh to binary STL file. Heav(i/en)ly inspired by Marius Watz
        Parameters:
        mesh - the mesh
        path - file path
        scale - scaling factor

      • saveToSimpleMesh

        public static void saveToSimpleMesh(HE_Mesh mesh,
                    java.lang.String path)
        Saves the mesh as simpleMesh format to the given file path. Existing files will be overwritten. The file gives the vertex coordinates and an indexed facelist.
        Parameters:
        mesh - the mesh
        path - the path

      • saveToHemesh

        public static void saveToHemesh(HE_Mesh mesh,
                java.lang.String path)
        Saves the mesh as hemesh format to the given file path. Existing files will be overwritten. The file contains the vertex coordinates and all half-edge interconnection information. Larger than a simpleMesh but much quicker to rebuild.
        Parameters:
        mesh - the mesh
        path - the path

      • saveToBinaryHemesh

        public static void saveToBinaryHemesh(HE_Mesh mesh,
                      java.lang.String path)
        Saves the mesh as binary hemesh format to the given file path. Existing files will be overwritten. The file contains the vertex coordinates and all half-edge interconnection information. About the same size of a simpleMesh but a lot quicker to rebuild. Due to compression about half as fast as an ordinary hemesh file but only a third in size.
        Parameters:
        mesh - the mesh
        path - the path

      • saveToPOV

        public static void saveToPOV(HE_Mesh mesh,
             HET_POVWriter pov,
             boolean normals)
        Saves the mesh as PovRAY mesh2 format by appending it to the given mesh.
        Parameters:
        mesh - the mesh
        pov - instance of HET_POVWriter
        normals - smooth faces HET_POVWriter instance.

      • saveToPOV

        public static void saveToPOV(HE_Mesh mesh,
             java.io.PrintWriter pw)
        Saves the mesh as PovRAY format to the given PrintWriter.
        Parameters:
        mesh - HE_Mesh
        pw - PrintWriter

      • saveToPOV

        public static void saveToPOV(HE_Mesh mesh,
             java.io.PrintWriter pw,
             boolean saveNormals)
        Saves the mesh as PovRAY format to the given PrintWriter.
        Parameters:
        mesh - HE_Mesh
        pw - PrintWriter
        saveNormals - boolean (Smooth face or otherwise)
